instructions: Fill in: cvss, short_description, fix, include_on_site

vulnerabilities.title: Microsoft Windows
vulnerabilities.name: Microsoft Windows Information Disclosure Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Microsoft Windows Desktop Windows Manager contains an information disclosure vulnerability that allows an authorized attacker to disclose information locally.

vulnerabilities.title: Gogs Gogs
vulnerabilities.name: Gogs Path Traversal Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Gogs contains a path traversal vulnerability affecting improper Symbolic link handling in the PutContents API that could allow for code execution.
vulnerabilities.fix: Upgrade to Gogs v0.13.0 or later.

vulnerabilities.title: Microsoft Office
vulnerabilities.name: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Code Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Microsoft Office PowerPoint contains a code injection vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a PowerPoint file with an OutlineTextRefAtom containing an invalid index value that triggers memory corruption.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Microsoft Office PowerPoint Code Injection Vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) OneView
vulnerabilities.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) OneView Code Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) OneView contains a code injection vulnerability that allows a remote unauthenticated user to perform remote code execution.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) OneView Code Injection Vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager
vulnerabilities.name: Cisco Unified Communications Products Code Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Cisco Unified Communications Manager (Unified CM), Cisco Unified Communications Manager Session Management Edition (Unified CM SME), Cisco Unified Communications Manager IM & Presence Service (Unified CM IM&P), Cisco Unity Connection, and Cisco Webex Calling Dedicated Instance contain a code injection vulnerability that could allow the attacker to obtain user-level access to the underlying operating system and then elevate privileges to root.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Cisco Unified Communications Products Code Injection Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.fix: Cisco has released the software updates and patch files to address the vulnerability

vulnerabilities.title: Synacor  Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS)
vulnerabilities.name: Synacor Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) PHP Remote File Inclusion Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Synacor Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) contains a PHP remote file inclusion vulnerability that could allow for remote attackers to craft requests to the /h/rest endpoint to influence internal request dispatching, allowing inclusion of arbitrary files from the WebRoot directory.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Synacor Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) PHP Remote File Inclusion Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.fix: Upgrade immediately to a patched version

vulnerabilities.title: Versa Concerto
vulnerabilities.name: Versa Concerto Improper Authentication Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Versa Concerto SD-WAN orchestration platform contains an improper authentication vulnerability in the Traefik reverse proxy configuration, allowing at attacker to access administrative endpoints. The internal Actuator endpoint can be leveraged for access to heap dumps and trace logs.
vulnerabilities.fix: Update to Versa Concerto 12.2.1 GA (released April 16, 2025). This patch addresses the underlying header-handling flaw.

vulnerabilities.title: Vite Vitejs
vulnerabilities.name: Vite Vitejs Improper Access Control Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Vite Vitejs contains an improper access control vulnerability that exposes content of non-allowed files using ?inline&import or ?raw?import. Only apps explicitly exposing the Vite dev server to the network (using --host or server.host config option) are affected.
vulnerabilities.cisaNotes: This vulnerability could affect an open-source component, third-party library, protocol, or proprietary implementation that could be used by different products. For more information, please see: https://github.com/vitejs/vite/commit/59673137c45ac2bcfad1170d954347c1a17ab949 ; https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-31125
vulnerabilities.fix: Upgrade your Vite installation to one of the following patched versions or later, (Vite 6.2.4 |6.1.3|6.0.13|5.4.16|4.5.11)

vulnerabilities.title: Prettier eslint-config-prettier
vulnerabilities.name: Prettier eslint-config-prettier Embedded Malicious Code Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Prettier eslint-config-prettier contains an embedded malicious code vulnerability. Installing an affected package executes an install.js file that launches the node-gyp.dll malware on Windows.
vulnerabilities.cisaNotes: This vulnerability could affect an open-source component, third-party library, protocol, or proprietary implementation that could be used by different products. For more information, please see: https://www.npmjs.com/package/eslint-config-prettier?activeTab=versions ; https://github.com/prettier/eslint-config-prettier/issues/339#issuecomment-3090304490 ; https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-54313
vulnerabilities.short_description: Prettier eslint-config-prettier Embedded Malicious Code Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.fix: Apply the latest Linux Kernel security updates.

vulnerabilities.title: Broadcom VMware vCenter Server
vulnerabilities.name: Broadcom VMware vCenter Server Out-of-bounds Write Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Broadcom VMware vCenter Server contains an out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the implementation of the DCERPC protocol. This could allow a malicious actor with network access to vCenter Server to send specially crafted network packets, potentially leading to remote code execution.
